readable.content: A male soccer player wearing a red uniform jumping in the air and pulling up his shorts . A soccer player pulls his shorts up . A soccer player wearing a red costume makes an obscene gesture . Man in red sports uniform and blue shoes jumping and pull up legs of shorts . We can see the white underwear of the man wearing the red soccer jersey because he is pulling up his shorts .
